title: MetaSoul Plugin - Bring Life To Games.
description: MetaSoul® energizes MetaHumans and NPCs with ChatGPT-4-driven conversations, real-time lip-sync, expressive faces, and dynamic emotions and memories, based on synthetic Myers-Briggs personalities..
longDescription:
Elevate Your MetaHuman Experience with MetaSoul®

Craft Real Personalities with ChatGPT


Unleash the Power of Emotion with MetaSoul® for Unreal Engine 5.3

Welcome to a new era of digital interaction, where your MetaHumans aren’t just avatars but entities with depth, emotion, and personality. MetaSoul, a groundbreaking plugin for Unreal Engine 5.3, bridges the gap between artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence, offering a suite of advanced features that revolutionize the way you interact with a MetaHuman in the metaverse and beyond.

Features:

  • Dynamic Personality Profiles: Dive into the world of Myers-Briggs personality types with 16 distinct personalities, each equipped with unique strengths, weaknesses, and characteristics. Tailor your MetaHuman's responses and interactions based on these rich, multi-faceted personas.
  • MetaSoul Speech API Integration: Combine MetaSoul® with the MetaSoul Speech API for nuanced emotion control over Microsoft voices, complete with lifelike lip sync and emotion synthesis for expressive avatars that truly speak to the audience.
  • Emotion Profile Graph (EPG): Experience emotional intelligence redefined. Our EPG technology captures and memorize emotional experiences and states in real-time, enabling your MetaHumans to exhibit dynamic emotional responses that adapt to the conversation and environment.
  • Real-Time Emotional Synthesis: Powered by MetaSoul’s revolutionary algorithms, this feature allows your creations to respond to stimuli with a range of twelve primary emotions, including anger, joy, trust, and surprise, making each interaction more meaningful and lifelike.
  • Emotion Recognition Classifiers: Achieve groundbreaking accuracy in emotion detection with more than 86% success rate (ISEAR), enhancing the depth and reliability of conversations.
  • Metaverse Interaction: Link your MetaHuman’s personality and emotional states to their actions in the metaverse, creating dynamic, engaging, and responsive interactions that bring the digital world to life.
  • Environment Awareness: Go beyond conversation—allow your AI to react emotionally to its surroundings for a fully immersive experience where the digital and real world seamlessly intersect.

Advantages:

  • Free Unreal Engine Plugin: Instantly integrate cutting-edge emotional intelligence into your MetaHumans with our free plugin, effortlessly bringing the power of MetaSoul® to your digital humans.
  • Affordable Pricing: Unlock the full potential of MetaSoul® for a one-time setup fee. Access a cost-effective solution that elevates your AI interactions without breaking the bank.
  • Patented Process: Rely on a secure and seamless development experience with MetaSoul’s patented process for programmatic persona development, ensuring safety and reliability.
  • Revolutionary Algorithms & 64 Trillion Emotional States: Experience the unparalleled depth of interaction with the ability to generate 64 trillion distinct emotional states every 1/10th of a second, thanks to our advanced real-time appraisal and EPG computation.

Transform Your Digital Experience Today

Join us on a journey to revolutionize digital interaction. With MetaSoul, you’re not just creating MetaHumans; you’re crafting beings with real personas, capable of genuine emotional depth and connection. Elevate your ChatGPT and metaverse experiences with MetaSoul Azure Persona API. Start your journey towards truly immersive AI interactions today.


Additional information:


To integrate and test MetaSoul's plugin functionalities for MetaHuman, which leverage both OpenAI services and Microsoft's Speech service on Azure, you'll need to obtain access keys for each service respectively. Here's a step-by-step guide to getting started:

  1. Azure Subscription: Before proceeding, ensure you have an active Azure subscription. If you don't, you can sign up for a free account which offers a range of free services and credits to explore Azure's capabilities.
  2. OpenAI on Azure:
  • Navigate to the Azure portal and search for the OpenAI service.
  • Create a new OpenAI resource. During this process, you'll be prompted to select a subscription and a resource group.
  • Once the resource is deployed, go to the resource page, and under the "Keys and Endpoint" section, you'll find your OpenAI API key. This key is required for accessing OpenAI's API through Azure.
  1. Microsoft Speech Service:
  • Similarly, search for the Speech service in the Azure portal and create a new resource.
  • Select the appropriate subscription and resource group for the Speech service as well.
  • After deployment, navigate to the resource's "Keys and Endpoint" section to retrieve your Speech service key.
  1. MetaSoul Access:
  • To integrate MetaSoul's functionalities, you also need a MetaSoul key. This key can be obtained for free for one month. Please click on this link to register and receive one month FREE MetaSoul® access key.

With these keys, you'll be able to authenticate and make API requests to both OpenAI and Microsoft Speech services through Azure, as well as utilize MetaSoul's features. Make sure to store these keys securely and use them as per the documentation provided by each service to test and develop your application effectively.

  • Documentation

Features: Access to the MetaSoul EPU cloud services thru web services, SaaS, or physical means(dongle).
